Portland.Satyricon (nightclub): Satyricon was a nightclub in the Old Town neighborhood of Portland, Oregon, United States. It was a well known venue for local and touring punk and alternative rock bands. The club operated from 1983 to 2010, making it the longest-running punk venue in the western United States, and has been called the "CBGB of the West Coast." The building in which it was located was demolished in 2011.
